summary.para: Represents key exchange data for hardware content protection.

remarks.para: A pointer to this structure is passed in the pData parameter of method when the is creating using the D3D11_KEY_EXCHANGE_HW_PROTECTION key exchange type.

summary.para: The function ID of the DRM command. The values and meanings of the function ID are defined by the DRM specification.
Pointer to a buffer containing a structure that specifies memory reserved for IHV use and the input data for the DRM command.
Pointer to a buffer containing a structure that specifies memory reserved for IHV use and the input data for the DRM command.
The result of the hardware DRM command.
